content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(x=-52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=61.0, y=-52.0) and furnace at position (x=63.0, y=-52.0)
- The furnaces are currently processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Copper ore mine at position(x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- The agent has harvested copper ore from this location but no specific mining drills or structures are recorded.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept new items. If the furnace result is full, it cannot accept more items.
  
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
